Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory164.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: 'This is where the "Tabula Akasha" collects world treasures. You should be the first human to ever set foot in this place.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Should I feel honored?', 3: '6'}
{3: "With the dull thud of the door, the Kowloong's vault is opened for the first time in a long time. Every inch of the chamber is filled with treasures collected from all over the world."}
{2: 'Ayla would freak if she found out...', 3: '9'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: 'Of course, compared with the records of your unsightly WGAA, everything lying here is a shining example of human existence. This makes it the greatest witness of the human era.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Human beings may only be a flash in the pan, but the fruits of their labor will turn into fossils and remain unforgotten.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'I know everything here. If you are interested, you can ask me about their stories if you so choose.', 4: '1'}
{2: '(Ask about a stone door covered in carvings)', 3: '14', 4: '(Ask about a sallow wine botte)', 5: '20'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "This is the stone door to the tomb of an ancient general. It's carved with every battle he fought. Artisans even carved the mane of every warhorse in fine detail.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "Insolent fool! I've never allowed anyone to approach me like that!", 4: '1'}
{2: "I'm just trying to get a closer look...", 3: '17'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Forget it. But next time... I recall an exquisite pattern on the gallows you might be interested in having a closer look at.', 4: '1'}
{2: '...Forget about it.', 3: '19'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Looks like that about wraps it up here. On to the next place.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Did you know? Brewing alcohol predates historical records. Humanity invented it even before iron.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "This wine in my hand here is more than a thousand years old. It's no longer drinkable, but it still carries a strong aroma.", 4: '1'}
{2: "(Sniff) I don't smell anything?", 3: '23'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'How can that be...? Has it lost its aroma?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'I only smell jasmine.', 3: '25'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "That's most likely my perfume... It must have overpowered the wine's scent. It's a shame you can't smell the aroma from a thousand years ago.", 4: '1'}
{2: "I don't think I'm really missing out on much...", 3: '27'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Looks like that about wraps it up here. On to the next place.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory164.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: "This is a collection of relatively modern cultural relics. There may be some things you've seen before.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'In the spotlight, one item seems out of place compared to the other treasures among the collection.'}
{2: "What's this doll...?", 3: '35'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: 'This was given by an ordinary girl from Kowloong...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Qu gently picks up the seemingly ordinary mechanical doll. You can now see that it is a peacock. She strokes the grooves on the doll and reminisces about in memories of the past.'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'She wanted to see the world outside Kowloong. Her dreams came true, but her story ended in tragedy.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Was she a friend of yours?', 3: '42'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'No... I have no need for friends. Besides, she offered nothing of value as a friend.', 4: '1'}
{2: "Friends don't need to be of value.", 3: '44'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Everything has value—much like these treasure. These are all priceless artifacts worthy of being passed down for all of eternity.', 4: '1'}
{2: "So, what's with the doll?", 3: '46'}
{3: 'Qu clenches her fist around the doll, but quickly releases her grip in fear of damaging it.'}
{2: 'This has no material value...', 3: '49'}
{2: 'Nor artistic value...', 3: '51'}
{2: "This is just an ordinary person's hopes and joys.", 3: '53'}
{2: 'You treasure it because...', 3: '55'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Presumptuous fool! I command you... Shut up!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'This proves that you really do see the value of humanity deep within your heart.', 3: '57'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Just as you plan on continuing with your explanation, a bionic peacock suddenly flies at you, squawking and pecking at your head.'}
{2: 'Is this your pet? Make it stop...', 3: '1000'}
{3: 'Qu merely just grins and shows no intention of stopping it.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Keep going, Huiyu! Peck harder! Make this insolent fool pay!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Huiyu', 3: 'Kaw! Kaw—!!'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: "That's all for today. It seems that you are still a long way from becoming a qualified partner... Especially, when it comes to showing me respect.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ouch, okay! Now get this bird outta here!'}
